author: Simon Difford
description: The classic recipe omits the sugar syrup, which makes this drink too sour for my taste. Duly sweetened, it is very much in the Sidecar or even Apple Cart vein.
name: Deauville
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix) (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
